TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {76393=Spanish brand Mondraker have been tearing up the bike geometry rule book since 2001. They premiered Forward Geometry in 2003, and have continued to evolve the concept into a best-selling product. Winning trail bike of the year with the Mondraker Foxy, they have now confirmed their place in the hall of fame. Tackling mountains with the improved handling and amazing climbing capabilites is what Mondraker do best.}
